content.body: The GitHub hover popovers actually make text selection impossible. Try to select the username of the last commit shown on https://github.com/whatwg/fetch. It's not possible and breaks down differently in each browser.
Works for me in Chrome on Linux.
It's not jank if you do it slowly and the dialog pops up while you're doing it?
It's definitely jank here. There's ways to workaround it, but it's not a great experience.
